   In seconds you'll be entering the fast paced world of Extreme PaintBrawl!
   PaintBrawl 4 will take you to an entire new level of PC PaintBrawl action!
   Improved markers, skins, battlegrounds and animations - PaintBrawl 4 sets
   the standard by which all other non-violent first person shooter games will
   be judged!
